languages.text: {n}Страж бледнеет, переводя взгляд, то на вас, то на {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}псайкера{/g}.{/n} "Н-не надо, госпо{mf|дин|жа}! Я лучше сам, чем этой дам в мыслях моих ковыряться, а то еще поломает там чего. Только молю, никому ни слова, а то мозги в кашу мне уже сам губернатор превратит".

traits.locale_text: {n}Страж бледнеет, переводя взгляд, то на вас, то на {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}псайкера{/g}.{/n} "Н-не надо, госпо{mf|дин|жа}! Я лучше сам, чем этой дам в мыслях моих ковыряться, а то еще поломает там чего. Только молю, никому ни слова, а то мозги в кашу мне уже сам губернатор превратит".

languages.text: {n}He pales, his eyes darting between you and Idira.{/n} "N-no need, my {mf|lord|lady}! I'd rather volunteer everything myself than let this one rummage around in my head — she might break something. But I beg of you, don't tell anyone, or the governor will turn my brains to mush for sure."{g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}{/g}
languages.original_text: {n}Страж бледнеет, переводя взгляд, то на вас, то на {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}псайкера{/g}.{/n} "Н-не надо, госпо{mf|дин|жа}! Я лучше сам, чем этой дам в мыслях моих ковыряться, а то еще поломает там чего. Только молю, никому ни слова, а то мозги в кашу мне уже сам губернатор превратит".

traits.locale_text: {n}He pales, his eyes darting between you and Idira.{/n} "N-no need, my {mf|lord|lady}! I'd rather tell everything myself than let this one rummage around in my head — she might break something. But I beg of you, don't tell anyone, or the governor will definitely mush my brains."

{n}He pales, his eyes darting between you and Idira.{/n} "N-no need, my {mf|lord|lady}! I'd rather tell everything myself than let this one rummage around in my head — she might break something. But I beg of you, don't tell anyone, or the governor will definitely mush my brains."

{n}He pales, his eyes darting between you and Idira.{/n} "N-no need, my {mf|lord|lady}! I'd rather volunteer everything myself than let this one rummage around in my head — she might break something. But I beg of you, don't tell anyone, or the governor will certainly mush my brains."

{n}He pales, his eyes darting between you and Idira.{/n} "N-no need, my {mf|lord|lady}! I'd rather volunteer everything myself than let this one rummage around in my head — she might break something. But I beg of you, don't tell anyone, or the governor will certainly mush my brains."

{n}He pales, his eyes darting between you and Idira.{/n} "N-no need, my {mf|lord|lady}! I'd rather volunteer everything myself than let this one rummage around in my head — she might break something. But I beg of you, don't tell anyone, or the governor will turn my brains to mush for sure."

{n}He pales, his eyes darting between you and Idira.{/n} "N-no need, my {mf|lord|lady}! I'd rather volunteer everything myself than let this one rummage around in my head — she might break something. But I beg of you, don't tell anyone, or the governor will turn my brains to mush for sure."

languages.text: {n}Er erblasst. Sein Blick huscht zwischen dir und Idira hin und her.{/n} "N-Nicht nötig, {mf|Lord|Lady}! Ich sage lieber freiwillig alles, als sie in meinem Kopf herumwühlen zu lassen ... sie könnte etwas kaputtmachen. Aber ich flehe Euch an, sagt niemandem etwas, sonst verwandelt der Gouverneur mein Gehirn unter Garantie zu Brei."{g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}{/g}
languages.original_text: {n}He pales, his eyes darting between you and Idira.{/n} "N-no need, my {mf|lord|lady}! I'd rather volunteer everything myself than let this one rummage around in my head — she might break something. But I beg of you, don't tell anyone, or the governor will turn my brains to mush for sure."{g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}{/g}

traits.locale_text: {n}Er erblasst. Sein Blick huscht zwischen dir und Idira hin und her.{/n} "N-Nicht nötig, {mf|Lord|Lady}! Ich sage lieber freiwillig alles, als sie in meinem Kopf herumwühlen zu lassen ... sie könnte etwas kaputtmachen. Aber ich flehe Euch an, sagt niemandem etwas, sonst verwandelt der Gouverneur mein Gehirn unter Garantie zu Brei."

languages.text: {n}Vous le voyez pâlir et ses yeux passent rapidement d'Idira à vous.{/n} « C'est i... inutile, Votre Seigneurie ! Je préfère tout vous dire volontairement que laisser cette femme me triturer le cerveau... Elle pourrait bien me laisser de méchantes séquelles ! En revanche, je vous conjure de ne révéler à personne ce que je vais vous dire, sans quoi le gouverneur me réduira la cervelle en bouillie. »{g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}{/g}
languages.original_text: {n}He pales, his eyes darting between you and Idira.{/n} "N-no need, my {mf|lord|lady}! I'd rather volunteer everything myself than let this one rummage around in my head — she might break something. But I beg of you, don't tell anyone, or the governor will turn my brains to mush for sure."{g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}{/g}

traits.locale_text: {n}Vous le voyez pâlir et ses yeux passent rapidement d'Idira à vous.{/n} « C'est i... inutile, Votre Seigneurie ! Je préfère tout vous dire volontairement que laisser cette femme me triturer le cerveau... Elle pourrait bien me laisser de méchantes séquelles ! En revanche, je vous conjure de ne révéler à personne ce que je vais vous dire, sans quoi le gouverneur me réduira la cervelle en bouillie. »

languages.text: {n}他脸色苍白，目光在你和伊迪拉之间来回移动。{/n}“不……不必了，大人！我宁愿自己说出所有的事情，也不希望这个人在我脑子里乱转，她可能会碰坏什么东西。不过我求求您，千万别把这事告诉任何人，不然总督肯定会让我‘肝脑涂地’。”{g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}{/g}
languages.original_text: {n}He pales, his eyes darting between you and Idira.{/n} "N-no need, my {mf|lord|lady}! I'd rather volunteer everything myself than let this one rummage around in my head — she might break something. But I beg of you, don't tell anyone, or the governor will turn my brains to mush for sure."{g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}{/g}

traits.locale_text: {n}他脸色苍白，目光在你和伊迪拉之间来回移动。{/n}“不……不必了，大人！我宁愿自己说出所有的事情，也不希望这个人在我脑子里乱转，她可能会碰坏什么东西。不过我求求您，千万别把这事告诉任何人，不然总督一定会把我的脑壳弄碎。”

languages.text: {n}青年は蒼白になり、その視線はあなたとイディラをすばやく往復する。{/n}「そ、そんなことしなくても、陛下！僕はこんな奴に頭をあちこちかき回されるくらいなら、喜んで全部白状しますよ…壊しちゃうかもしれないんでしょう。ですが、お願いです。誰にも言わないでください。バレたら総督に脳みそをぐちゃぐちゃにされてしまうのは目に見えてます」
languages.original_text: {n}He pales, his eyes darting between you and Idira.{/n} "N-no need, my {mf|lord|lady}! I'd rather volunteer everything myself than let this one rummage around in my head — she might break something. But I beg of you, don't tell anyone, or the governor will turn my brains to mush for sure."

traits.locale_text: {n}青年は蒼白になり、その視線はあなたとイディラをすばやく往復する。{/n}「そ、そんなことしなくても、閣下！僕はこんな奴に頭をあちこちかき回されるくらいなら、喜んで全部白状しますよ…壊しちゃうかもしれないんでしょう。ですが、お願いです。誰にも言わないでください。バレたら総督が僕の頭をぐちゃぐちゃにするのは目に見えてます」

languages.text: {n}Ha palidecido, sus ojos se movían entre Idira y tú.{/n} «¡No es necesario, mi{mf|lord|lady}! Prefiero hacerlo todo yo antes que dejar que esta rebusque en mi cabeza, porque podría romper algo. Pero le ruego que no se lo diga a nadie, o el gobernador me hará papilla el cerebro».{g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}{/g}
languages.original_text: {n}He pales, his eyes darting between you and Idira.{/n} "N-no need, my {mf|lord|lady}! I'd rather volunteer everything myself than let this one rummage around in my head — she might break something. But I beg of you, don't tell anyone, or the governor will turn my brains to mush for sure."{g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}{/g}

traits.locale_text: {n}Ha palidecido, sus ojos se movían entre Idira y tú.{/n} «¡No es necesario, mi{mf|lord|lady}! Prefiero hacerlo todo yo antes que dejar que esta rebusque en mi cabeza, porque podría romper algo. Pero le ruego que no se lo diga a nadie, o el gobernador me hará papilla el cerebro».

languages.text: {n}Askerin benzi atıyor; gözleri, İdira'yla aranda mekik dokuyor.{/n} "Hiç gerek yok {mf|lordum|leydim}! Bu hanımın kafamı kurcalamasına izin vermektense kendi rızamla açık ederim. İmparator korusun bir şeyleri bozabilir... Ama yalvarırım kimseye söylemeyin yoksa vali, kesin pekmezimi akıtır."{g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}{/g}
languages.original_text: {n}He pales, his eyes darting between you and Idira.{/n} "N-no need, my {mf|lord|lady}! I'd rather volunteer everything myself than let this one rummage around in my head — she might break something. But I beg of you, don't tell anyone, or the governor will turn my brains to mush for sure."{g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}{/g}

Bu hanımın kafamı kurcalamasına izin vermektense kendi rızamla açık ederim. İmparator korusun bir şeyleri bozabilir... Ama yalvarırım kimseye söylemeyin yoksa vali, kesin pekmezimi akıtır."
